content: or until desired heel no stitches these were knit in row 19 length you should have 31 heel sts instep k across all instep stitches bind off using *elizabeth zimmermann s sewn bind off or other stretchy bind off weave in all ends round 2 heel k k2tog k to last 2 sts ssk instep k across all instep stitches techniques round 3 heel k2tog slip_stitch k to last two sts k2 judy s magic cast on instep k across all instep stitches http //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html round 4 k across all sts elizabeth zimmerann s sewn bind off http //community knitpicks com/notes/binding_off_- round 5 _sewn_bind_off heel k slip_stitch k to last st k instep k across all instep stitches more fitting tips and modification stitch count chart http //singlestitchknit wordpress com/2012/06/28/basic- repeat rounds 4 & 5 ten times for a total of twenty knee-high-toe-up-sock-pattern/ rounds leg k across all stitches for 35 rounds k increase round increase round heel k1 m1l k to last heel stitch m1r k1 instep k1 m1l k to last instep stitch m1r k1 k across sts for 10 rounds k increase round repeat these 11 rounds four more times for a total of 55 rounds k across 10 more rounds * = see technique links at end of pattern © 2012 single stitch knit all rights reserved page | 3 https //singlestitchknit wordpress com
